title: Bird lets you control the electronics around you just by pointing
text:
Bird lets you control the electronics around you just by pointing 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
As we head into the Internet of Things, humans are looking at a future that is more connected than ever. Bird is a wearable gadget that make...
